tool_description: Calculates inventory turnover rates and velocity metrics based on historical sales data and current stock levels.

product_ids.description: List of product IDs to calculate turnover rates for

analysis_period_days.description: Number of days to analyze for turnover calculation (7-365)

current_stock_levels.description: Current inventory quantities for each product

sales_data.description: Historical sales quantities for each product in the analysis period

error_messages: Data length mismatch: product_ids, current_stock_levels, and sales_data arrays must have the same length.
Invalid analysis period: analysis_period_days must be between 7 and 365.
Negative values detected: Stock levels and sales data cannot contain negative numbers.
Insufficient sales data: Unable to calculate turnover rate with zero or minimal sales history.
usage: Provide product_ids with corresponding current_stock_levels and sales_data arrays. Set analysis_period_days to define the historical window for turnover calculation.

product_ids.description: Product IDs processed for turnover analysis

turnover_rates.description: Calculated turnover rates (sales/average inventory) for each product

days_on_hand.description: Estimated days of inventory remaining at current sales velocity

velocity_category.description: Velocity classification for each product (fast, medium, slow, dead)
